indices.Message:
Stabs foes then fiercely slashes upward.
Can send foes flying high into the air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Motion changes. Increases number of hits.</COL>

Charges forward with the blade extended,
knocking down any caught in its path.
Use the <PADM>left stick<KEYM>move key</KEYM> to control the direction.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases movement distance. Increases
number of hits.</COL>

Lunges in while driving the hilt of the blade into
the target. Though limited in range it easily stuns
foes and reduces the Stamina of enraged enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Reduces Stamina cost. Increases range of the effect.</COL>

Steps backward in a swift evasive maneuver
while delivering a slashing blow.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Motion changes with an additional attack.
Adds an additional input.</COL>

Spins the blade in a swift circle,
slashing at foes all around the user.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

Build up strength before striking enemies with the side 
of your blade. Has high stunning power. Release the attack
as the charge finishes to increase power significantly.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases total charge stages (1→2).</COL>

Thrust your blade with great force into the air.
Especially effective against aerial enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.
Increases number of hits.</COL>

Hold the blade in wait. Upon deflecting an
enemy's attack, the user will unleash a series of blows.
Only a successful counter will perform multiple blows.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases number of hits. Increases counter duration.</COL>

Step inward to receive an enemy's attack.
Can be used out of many different actions. Upon successfully 
receiving an attack, the revenge gauge will fill greatly.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases revenge gauge accumulation.
LV.6: Can be used even during stagger and knockback.</COL>

Swing your blade in fierce downward motions left and right,
repeatedly cutting into foes in succession. Continuously
pressing the skill button increases the number of attacks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the maximum number of attacks (7→11).</COL>

Jump high upward, viciously thrusting the blade at
a concentrated point with great force. The attack's
range is very narrow, but it carries tremendous power.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases number of hits.</COL>

After channeling enough energy, release
a devastating slash with your body's entire might.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of skill.
LV.6: Adds wind pressure to the blade and increases number
of hits.</COL>

While climbing an enemy, thrust the blade
deep into them and vigorously shake it around.
The number of shakes increases with repeated button presses.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of skill.
LV.6: Increases maximum number of shakes.</COL>

Slam the blade into the ground with the entire
body's might and shake the earth. Performing the skill
from high altitudes while in the air, or holding the
assigned button on the ground increases the damage of the skill.
Especially effective against downed enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6: Increases maximum charge amount (1→2)</COL>

EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage.
Further increase damage when revenge gauge is full.
<COL ff7878>Further increase damage to Demihuman/Ogre/Giant enemies.</COL>

EX Additional Effects:
If this skill is used before being hit, damage increases and
revenge gauge increases as you hit enemies.

EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage.
Increase knockout power.
Increase the number of hits (1→2).
The second hit can be activated by pressing
and holding the assigned button.

EX Additional Effects:
Slightly increase chance attack.
Slightly increase exhaust power.
<COL ff7878>Further increase damage against War-Ready enemies</COL>

EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage.
Further increase damage when revenge gauge is full.
Increase invulnerability duration if you avoid the enemy at the
closest possible moment.

EX Additional Effects:
Increase damage of the additional hits after evasion
if you avoid the enemy at the closest possible moment.
Increase revenge gauge as you hit enemies.

EX Additional Effects:
Change motions, increase the number of hits.
Can be used when staggered.

EX Additional Effects:
Increase blow power.
Extend the range of the attack forward.
